multiplechoiceresponse.label: Class imbalance occurs when what?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: The number of data points in one class is significantly higher than the others.
The model is overfitting to the majority class.
The model is underfitting to the minority class.
The model is not able to learn the class boundary between two classes.
